kickstart.post:
Rocks &rocks_version; Development Server
chkconfig --del autofs
if [ ! -d /home ]; then mkdir -p /home; fi
if [ ! -d /mnt/cdrom ]; then mkdir -p /mnt/cdrom; fi
MYSQL_HOME=/opt/rocks/etc /usr/bin/mysqldump -u apache cluster rolls
/opt/rocks/bin/mysql -u apache cluster -e 'update nodes set name="&hostname;" where ID=1' /opt/rocks/bin/rocks set host interface ip &hostname; eth0 &hostaddr; /opt/rocks/bin/rocks set host interface name &hostname; eth0 &hostname; /opt/rocks/bin/rocks set host membership &hostname; "Development Appliance" /opt/rocks/bin/rocks remove host interface &hostname; eth1 /opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host > /etc/hosts
